Description:
Stylish Designer Living
This well located and attractive 2-bedroom unit presents a great opportunity for those seeking a modern low maintenance lifestyle or a stylish investment property. Offering 2 generous bedrooms with built in robes, bathroom, w/c and single R/C garage with internal access downstairs and large open plan kitchen/meals/family room upstairs leading out onto the balcony overlooking the park land. The sleek modern kitchen includes gas hot plates, electric oven, dishwasher, pantry and plenty of cupboard space, Year-round comfort is taken care of with the with split system heating and cooling unit. Currently leased at $290 per week till Jan 2020 this is a fantastic opportunity to add to your property portfolio. Located close to Newcomb Shopping Centres, schools and public transport and 10 minutes to Geelong CBD. Whether you're searching for your first home, downsizing or simply looking for your next investment this fantastic opportunity should not be overlooked.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
A Place To Call Home!
Nestled at the end of a quiet cul de sac, this charming home invites you to move straight in without lifting a finger!
A convenient lifestyle is part of the package with public transport and local amenities within easy walking distance from your front door. Stephania Mews Reserve is just footsteps away, while the nearby sporting grounds of St Albans Reserve will delight fitness enthusiasts. Both Geelong East Primary School and The Gordon (East Geelong Campus) are a short stroll away - making this an ideal choice for young families and students alike. Buckleys Entertainment Centre is close by, while a short drive will find you at the shopping centres on the Bellarine Highway.
An abundance of northern light sweeps through the front lounge, which flows through to the dining/kitchen zone. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry and cooking appliances (oven, gas hob, rangehood). All three bedrooms boast built-in robes, while the main bathroom is complete with a shower, bathtub, and single vanity. The laundry with storage and separate toilet complete the functional layout.
Ducted heating and an air conditioner keep you comfortable in all seasons.
With the secure backyard home to several alfresco areas, outdoor entertaining is a must! Complete with café blinds and a potbelly heater, the sheltered alfresco puts the elements in place for year-round enjoyment. The sun-drenched deck boasts a built-in BBQ, while the entertaining deck with built-in bar and built-in bench seats will impress. Surrounded by tranquil gardens, these outdoor areas set the scene for lively gatherings that linger long into the night.
The backyard also offers space for children and pets to play, while promoting eco-friendly living with a chook pen and veggie garden.
The remote single lock-up garage features rear roller door access - ideal for those looking to store an additional vehicle or trailer.
When it comes to easy and convenient living, this home packs a punch! So whether you're a first homebuyer, investor, downsizer, or young family - place this home at the top of your list!

Description:
Beautifully Updated In Whisper Quiet Court
Looking for the perfect affordable first home, downsize alternative or set and forget investment? This spacious and recently updated 2br unit has a bright and airy interior and a generous courtyard with the bonus of a side gate for additional and secure off street parking (ideal for second car, trailer or caravan). Comprising a sizeable living room, separate meals area, renovated kitchen with SS appliances, two generous bedrooms with birs and an updated central bathroom. Feat include a single lock-up garage (remote), gas heating, SS/AC x 2 & a freshly painted interior. Representing excellent value for what's on offer, enquire today!

Description:
Just move in and relax.
Here is an excellent opportunity to enter the real estate market without having to dip back into your pocket and spend more money when you move in. At an excellent price point this property will make a fantastic first home and is ready for the new owner to move the family in & entertain immediately. Offering loads of undercover entertaining with living areas overlooking the yard and plenty of space for car/caravan/boat accommodation. All three bedrooms include good-sized built-in robes, sunblinds and new wall to wall carpet. Main bathroom has had some updating that includes shower & bath with separate toilet off the neat laundry. The kitchen is well positioned with the plenty of bench space, stainless steel freestanding cooker, slate floors, enough space for meals area & sofa and opens to the entertaining area as well as overlooking the yard. The main lounge is separate with new wall to wall carpet, gas wall heater, split system, ceiling fan and glass sliding door. Other features include double tandem carport, garden shed, double blinds throughout on 570m2 and rental estimate of $310-$330pw. Call Donna now to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
INVESTMENT PERFECTION IN A QUIET COURT
Long term tenant paying $180.00 per week until August 2019 with a strong desire to stay on in the property. Located in a very quiet Court just off Boundary Road, this neat option is perfect to retain as an investment and just set and forget. Large bedroom with BIR's, open plan kitchen living offering gas heating and a very functional combined bathroom/laundry. Carport and a very neat and tidy private yard west facing to enjoy the afternoon sun. Positioned close to sporting reserves, public transport and so close to all the City has to offer. A better option than Bank interest, call today!!!

Description:
Opportunity Is Knocking In Whittington!
Occupying approx. 754m2, this potential-packed property presents buyers with a world of opportunities! Whether you're looking to secure your first home or investment, searching for a great renovation project, or planning to wipe the slate clean for development (STCA) - this property is the one for you!
With everything you could possibly need within close reach, this location comes hand-in-hand with a convenient lifestyle. Public transport is footsteps away, while the shopping centres on the Bellarine Highway provide all of your daily essentials. Growing families are taken great care of with Whittington Primary School, Geelong East Primary School, and Newcomb Secondary College just moments away. The Gordon Tafe's East Geelong Campus is wonderfully close by, along with the St Albans Reserve sporting grounds and Buckley's Entertainment Centre.
The original interiors grant you the option to move straight in or to rejuvenate with a contemporary touch (STCA). A wood heater creates a cosy ambience in the lounge, while the dining zone provides ample space for family dinners. The kitchen features a built-in pantry, breakfast bar, and stainless steel cooking appliances (wall oven, electric cooktop, rangehood).
The Master Bedroom is complete with built-in robes and direct access to the backyard. Two additional bedrooms share close access to the bathroom, while the laundry completes the layout. An air conditioner and ceiling fans keep you comfortable in the summer months.
The expansive backyard promotes eco-friendly living with a chook pen, veggie garden, and fruit trees. Children and pets alike will love that they have plentiful space to roam and explore.
The long, secure driveway features a single carport and provides backyard vehicle access - ideal for those looking to store caravans, boats, or trailers. The double lock-up garage offers secure parking, along with a built-in office and generous workshop.
Bursting with infinite potential, you'll need to act swiftly to secure this terrific opportunity! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
IMMACULATE CONTEMPORARY HOME
Fringing St Albans Park, this impressive property consisting 3 bedroom, study, 2 bath, open plan kitchen, meals, living, and oversized garage where you can also store jet ski/motor bike, is set on approx 475m2 and has all you need and more.
Tucked away in a quiet street would suit a young professional couple or family, downsizer or investor. Comprising of a neat entry and front open plan living which offers ceiling fan and split system heating and cooling, flowing into the spacious kitchen/meals area that seats up to 6, which really is the hub of the home. The kitchen is equipped with S/S appliances Dishlex dishwasher, Technika gas cook top and electric oven, laminated benchtops which double as an island bench, with loads of cupboard space. Down the hall you will find 2 bedrooms with ceiling fans, all large in size with BIR and an additional room which can be used as either a bedroom or study. All offer great natural light. Plus a central bathroom with full size bath and separate shower. At the rear of the home is the amazing size master bedroom with WIR and ensuite. Outside there is an entertaining deck area perfect for bbq's and where you can sit, relax all year round. With a beautiful manicured back lawn and low maintenance garden, all you need to do is move in and enjoy. This wonderful property is modern, low maintenance and ideally positioned just a stones throw away from Newcomb shopping centre, local schools, public transport and a 5kms drive to Geelong CBD and the beautiful water front.
• 1.5 garage remote control
• 475m2 Approx
• $380-$400 rent per week
• Split system heat/cool
• Heat lamps
• Own title

Description:
Comfortable and private, low maintenance living.
Situated in a convenient pocket, this neat two-bedroom unit is ideal for those searching for a quiet, comfortable and convenient lifestyle. Comprising 2 spacious bedrooms, both with built in robes and dressing tables, an open plan kitchen, living and dining area, a relatively large bathroom with separate toilet, and a large dedicated laundry with access to the private rear courtyard and carport. This unit has been meticulously maintained over the years an offers brand new carpet throughout, making it a home you can move straight into without the need of renovating.
Set in a quiet and friendly unit complex with a wide circular driveway, this particular type of unit with so open space does not come up often with the ever-increasing population of Geelong. Just a short walk to the local shops, public transport essentially on your doorstep, the Gordon Institute across the road and just a 5-minute drive to the Geelong CBD, the convenience of this immaculate unit is sure to impress. Inspect today!

Description:
Location, Convenience and Prime Opportunity!
On a substantial corner allotment of 611m2 (approx.) you wont want to miss out on this neat, single level brick home that offers an opportunity to move in and enjoy as is or invest with future scope to subdivide and develop STCA.
Vastly becoming a more enticing location to young families and city professionals, the maths will be sure to add up in your favour. Within 500 metres to local shopping centres, primary and secondary schools, this prime prospect wont last long.
This well positioned family home offers three bedrooms all with built in robes and master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe. You can only be impressed by the large light filled family living and sun room with floor to ceiling windows and ceiling fan. The kitchen includes gas burner cook top, 900mm oven, dishwasher and breakfast bar. There is also ample storage with separate dining room, gas wall heater and air conditioner. The central family bathroom includes bath, vanity with separate shower room and toilet, aswell as a spacious laundry and second separate toilet.
There is a double lock-up garage with side gate access for additional car/boat storage, 6.5m x 6.5m second garage, fully fenced and low-maintenance manicured gardens. Taking full advantage of the undercover area, ready to entertain family and friends.
Situated in the ever-growing suburb of Whittington, this home offers easy access to public transport, primary and secondary schools, bike tracks and shopping facilities.
Dont miss your chance to secure this great opportunity.
Roncon Real Estate An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.

Description:
Calling all investors & first homebuyers alike.
An opportunity not to be missed is this well presented 3 bedroom brick veneer family home set on a good sized 613m2 (approx.) block in the heart of Whittington. With a good sized living room with gas wall heater and split system heating and cooling for year round comfort, functional kitchen/meals area, central family bathroom and a good sized laundry. Outdoors is a covered entertaining area for those summer bbqs with a good sized back yard for the kids or pets to play in. Additional features include solar panels, garden shed, single lock up garage and carport. This is a fantastic opportunity to add to your property portfolio. Located close to Newcomb Shopping Centres and within walking distance to local primary and secondary schools, community centre, public transport and 10 minutes to Geelong CBD. Whether you're searching for your first home, downsizing or simply looking for your next investment, this fantastic opportunity should not be overlooked.

Description:
Beautifully presented home with so much to offer.
When you walk into this beautifully presented home you will be pleasantly surprised. Freshly painted, new carpet, and recently lacquered slate tiles. There is nothing to do but just move in. With the master bedroom and formal lounge at the front of the home and with the main bedroom having doorway access to the central bathroom. Bathroom with large shower and separate bath tub. Walk through to the open plan kitchen and dining. Kitchen with stainless steel appliances including electric oven, gas cooktop and rangehood. Large pantry all looking over the enormous backyard. Second and third bedrooms off the kitchen all bedrooms with BIRs. Newly polished deck to set up the perfect entertaining area for those lovely sunny afternoons. Double lockup garage with extra workshop space. Bellarine Rail trail to Queenscliff within minutes away. All of this set in a quite court and sitting on 785sqm lock (approx.) Walking distance to Bellarine Village & Newcomb Central shopping centers, Primary and Secondary schools, Geelong CBD and Waterfront. Short drive to the Bellarine Peninsula and wineries what more could you ask for.

Description:
Beautifully Maintained Townhouse in Ideal Location
This attractive property offers the perfect opportunity for downsizers, investors or first home buyers with enough space to enjoy entertaining and experience the fabulous lifestyle that comes with this location.
The home is immaculate and has been up-kept to the highest standards. On entry, you are greeted with a spacious bedroom either side of the hallway both with built in robes and plantation shutters on the windows, with loads of natural light.
The large updated bathroom is easily accessible between the bedrooms, featuring shower, vanity and ample storage.
To the rear of the home is an open kitchen/dining area which can seat at least 6 people .The well-appointed kitchen features S/S appliances, with dishwasher, abundant storage, and ample bench space.
Off the lounge area through a sliding glass door opens out to an expansive gorgeous outdoor alfresco room, fully decked with 2 ceiling fans. The north facing sized backyard provides your own private outdoor oasis.
A single remote garage with direct entry provides security, convenience and additional storage. Gas heating and S/S provides comfort all year round.
Rent $320 p/w approx
Located, close to public transport, schools, and shops within 10min drive to CBD this home must be viewed.

Description:
Ticks All The Boxes
Stop looking!! This well positioned family home has everything on your checklist. Surrounded by other quality homes this modern 4-bedroom home is situated close to Geelong's CBD, schools, shopping centres, horse racing and sporting facilities. The upper level consists of a huge master bedroom with full ensuite and his & hers WIR, a generous sized bathroom with separate WC and 2 queen sized bedrooms with WIR's. Downstairs there is a well-appointed kitchen with WIP and S/S appliances, 2 living zones and a 4th Bedroom/study, laundry and separate powder room. Year-round comfort is taken care of with ducted gas heating and Evaporative Cooling. Outside you will find a double garage adjoined to the home with rear access and driveway leading to a 7x6m approx. shed at the rear of the property. With features including an outside entertainment area, secure front fence, roller shutters, water tank and 16 solar panels this very desirable home is ready for you to move straight in.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Corner Block Set to Corner Your Imagination
On the market for the very first time this beloved 1950s style family home is brilliant with light, superb with space and bursting with original charm and character.
The home comprises of three sizable bedrooms serviced by the vintage style family bathroom and set alongside a spacious light filled family room, which features original gas heater and modernised with a split system heater/cooler.
The large formal dining room adjoins the living room and has a two-way gas heater and allows access to the rear bedroom. The kitchen offers a retro feel and comes complete with electric stove, ample bench space, tiled splash back and a plethora of natural light.
Additional features include a large laundry with extra storage, high ceilings throughout, outdoor undercover area and a single car garage.
If youre looking for a great opportunity, then take advantage of this well positioned solidly built property in the ever-growing suburb of Whittington. With the large backyard you are free to renovate, extend and make this into your dream family home, or future scope to subdivide & develop STCA.
This home offers easy access to public transport, primary and secondary schools, bike tracks and shopping facilities.
Roncon Real Estate An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.

Description:
Perfect Starter/Development Opportunity On 711m2 (Approx)
Ideally located within close proximity to renowned schools, sporting reserves, cafes, the Geelong CBD and shopping while offering easy access to the Geelong Ring Road and both the Bellarine Peninsula and Surf Coast is this exceptional opportunity.
Positioned perfectly, the home represents endless potential for families, investors, developers or first homebuyers in this truly exclusive location. Spacious and charming, the home offers three spacious bedrooms, a light filled open plan living, dining and kitchen that includes ample bench and cupboard space, dishwasher while adjacent is the dining/meals area that flows through to the family lounge room. The family bathroom is centrally located, while the laundry is at the rear.
Well-thought out in design, this flowing floor plan provides great space and comfort for any family big or small. Cozy fireplace in the living zone offers comfort all year round, as well as plenty of natural flowing light throughout.
The outside of the home will be the talking point amongst buyers, a sun drenched front and back yard that offer endless potential, as well as a lock up garage/workshop.
An inviting façade ready for its new owners! Enjoy as is, or extend develop (STCA).
Situated on 711m2 approx allotment offering rare affordability, this outstanding opportunity is one not to be missed.

Description:
Sound Investment In Growth Suburb
Neatly tucked away at the end of a quiet court and yet close to main routes to CBD and Bellarine. This tastefully renovated unit is both private and spacious. With a good tenant currently paying $210 per week, this presents as an excellent investment.
- Large light filled bedroom with double built in robes
- Upgraded kitchen and living split system A/C and heating
- Laundry and good sized bathroom
- North facing, fully fenced rear yard with shed
- Single carport with space for visitor parking
- Good tenant paying $210/week happy to stay
- Quick access to CBD, Bellarine and Surfcoast
- Quiet yet friendly neighborhood

Description:
Value, Position and Potential
Situated on a large allotment of 662m2 approx. and only 10 minutes from Geelong CBD, Schools, Shops and public transport this well looked after brick home offers a perfect opportunity for investors or first home buyers looking to enter the market place.
- Close to Bellarine Village and Newcomb Central Shopping Centre
- Proximity to a selection of primary and secondary schools
- Walk to sporting grounds and The Gordon - East Geelong campus
- Terrific access to Bellarine Highway and the Surf Coast
- Three substantial bedrooms with build-in robes
- Spacious light filled lounge and a separate family room
- Well equipped timber kitchen with gas cooking
- Reverse cycle air conditioning, gas log fire and ceiling fans
- Large double garage with three-phase power and a workshop
- Wide driveway, secure space for caravan/boat, garden shed
